item.title: Apps
item.description: Apps Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 811 Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: A summary of what is an “App integration” and how it fits into the Okta org object model. Provide links to help docs for more information. Why is this here?: Requested by product management (Jeff Taylor).

Page type: Navigation Content type: Summary redirect A redirect provides a summary of a topic with links to the articles elsewhere in the site that cover that content in full.
